title: What are my GCash Wallet and Transaction Limits
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

The wallet and transaction limits of your GCash account depend on your GCash Profile. Your transaction limits reset **every 1st day of the month**. Find out more about your GCash Wallet and Transaction Limits below.

### **Different Limits for your GCash Account**

- **Wallet limit** \- Maximum amount of funds that you can keep in your GCash
- **Incoming Transaction Limit** \- Maximum amount that you can receive in your GCash Wallet (ex: Cash In, Receive Money)
- **Outgoing Transaction Limit** \- Maximum amount that you can send to another GCash Wallet, bank, or withdrawal (ex: Send Money, Bank Transfer, Cash Out)
- [**Express Send Transaction Count Limit**](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/44143833564185) \- A monthly limit on the number of send & receive transactions for Express Send
- **[GCash Card Limits](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30286810141977)**\- Maximum amount per transaction or per withdrawal via ATM
- [**GSave Transaction Limits**](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/4414721290521-What-are-the-GSave-Interest-Rates-and-Transaction-Limits) \- Maximum amount that you can deposit or withdraw from your GSave account

### Specific Limits per GCash Profile

|  | Basic | GCash Jr | Fully Verified | GCash Plus | GCash Platinum |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Profile Overview | For new or non-verified GCash users | For users aged **7-17 years old** | For [Fully Verified](https://help.gcash.com/hc/articles/360017722393-Get-Fully-Verified) GCashusers | For Fully Verified GCash users with a linked bank account or investment | For eligible Globe Platinum Subscribers. Please contact Globe directly for questions. |
| **Wallet Limit**(Maximum amount that can be kept in a GCash Wallet) |
| At any given time | PHP 10,000 | PHP 50,000 | PHP 100,000 | PHP 500,000 | PHP 1,000,000 |
| **Incoming Transaction Limit**(Maximum amount that can be received in a GCash Wallet) |
| Monthly | PHP 5,000 | PHP 10,000 | PHP 100,000 | PHP 500,000 | PHP 1,000,000 |
| **Outgoing Transaction Limit**(Maximum amount that can be spent and sent in a GCash Wallet) |
| Daily | None | PHP 10,000 | PHP 100,000 | PHP 100,000 | PHP 500,000 |
| Monthly | PHP 5,000 | PHP 10,000 | None | None | PHP 1,000,000 |

### **Need more Help?**
